content: Hey all you Terminology folks out there! Connectathon 27 is happening May 17-19 and our resident Terminology Track Leads are not available to run the track. The track proposal and scenarios are already laid out and I am sure that the esteemed Rob Hausam would be happy to help a volunteer or two prepare. If you are interested in contributing to the FHIR community as a Terminology Track Lead please reach out and let me know!
